shopifyCollection.title: Maxine
shopifyCollection.description: We love pups and we love New York, so we were sure to answer when Maxine the Fluffy Corgi came a-howlin’. NYC’s favorite short-legged-dog-who-lives-in-a-backpack now has her very own pennants, patches, banners and bags courtesy of the fleabags at Oxford Pennant.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: We love pups and we love New York, so we were sure to answer when Maxine the Fluffy Corgi came a-howlin’. NYC’s favorite short-legged-dog-who-lives-in-a-backpack now has her very own pennants, patches, banners and bags courtesy of the fleabags at Oxford Pennant.

products.title: Dog Person Camp Flag • Maxine x Oxford Pennant
products.description: This camp flag is part of our collaboration with Maxine the Fluffy Corgi, celebrating the chonk and cuteness of our favorite four-legged influencer. Size: 18" x 24" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-print design Color: Pink body, Orange & Yellow details
products.descriptionHtml:
This camp flag is part of our collaboration with Maxine the Fluffy Corgi, celebrating the chonk and cuteness of our favorite four-legged influencer.

Size: 18" x 24" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-print design

Color: Pink body, Orange & Yellow details

products.title: Custom Dog Name Banner
products.description: Want a banner made special for your dog? Look no further. Make a custom piece featuring one of your dog's 100 nicknames! Not seeing the colorways you want? Check out our custom hometown banner for other options! Size: 28 " x 6" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt Color: Pick from our options above Please note: our ability to customize colors is limited to the options above. Size cannot be changed. Max 12 characters. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.
products.descriptionHtml:
Want a banner made special for your dog? Look no further. Make a custom piece featuring one of your dog's 100 nicknames!

Not seeing the colorways you want? Check out our custom hometown banner for other options! 
Size: 28 " x 6" 

Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt

Color: Pick from our options above

Please note: our ability to customize colors is limited to the options above. Size cannot be changed. Max 12 characters. Turnaround time is 14-18 business days. All sales on custom pieces are final.
